subject: That's Why!
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Hi All;

 This is why I say don't get so tied up asking questions and trying to 
get that one profound answer while missing all the real stuff. In the 
file I have in my folder of the 30 second test of #36, the very first 
voice is "Thomas Edison(sung)--I Never Visited Frank", I did not hear 
this until the third time I listened to the entire session. I'm not so 
intent on runing session after session all friggin' day that I don't 
have/take time to listen. If I was trying to hear this stuff direct, I 
would miss it, and simialr voices about 99% of the time. That's why, 
forget the damn questions, and just listen--over and over till you 
think you've gotten it all. Even my dad, and son come through in their 
own time, I don't costantly ask for them. I swear to God, they know who 
is listening, when you are listening/recording, and what you need to 
know! Trust it!

 I know, the idiot scientist type will insist you have to ask 
questions, and confirm the answers, but that is BS, and results little 
useful information. Useful, as in has personal signifgance. 

 Frank-S
